price: 一直到他到达了两山之间的时候，他发现前面有一种人，他们几乎不懂〔他的〕话。
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ بَيۡنَ ٱلسَّدَّيۡنِ وَجَدَ مِن دُونِهِمَا قَوۡمٗا لَّا يَكَادُونَ يَفۡقَهُونَ قَوۡلٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā balagha bayna al-sadayni wajada min dūnihimā qawman lā yakādūna yafqahūna qawlan
